title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on event-centric NLP, focusing on event representation, extraction
**"Event Extraction from Newswire Articles"** by Ralph Grishman, et al
A foundational paper on event extraction techniques from news articles
**"A Survey on Event Extraction Methods from Text"** by Thien Huu Nguyen, et al
A comprehensive survey of various event extraction methods
**"Joint Event Extraction via Recurrent Neural Networks"** by Lifu Huang, et al
Discusses the use of RNNs for joint event extraction tasks
**"Event Detection and Domain Adaptation with Convolutional Neural Networks"** by Yubo Chen, et al
Explores CNNs for event detection and domain adaptation
**"Event Representation with Tensor-based Compositional Semantics"** by Karl Moritz Hermann, et al
Introduces tensor-based methods for event representation
**"Event Extraction as Dependency Parsing"** by Thomas Lin, et al
Proposes a dependency parsing approach to event extraction
**"A Hierarchical Model of Events in Natural Language Discourse"** by Nathanael Chambers, et al
Discusses a hierarchical model for understanding events in discourse
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Focuses on event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Extraction Using Distant Supervision"** by Alan Ritter, et al
Explores distant supervision techniques for event extraction
**"Event Extraction via Dynamic Multi-Pooling Convolutional Neural Networks"** by Yubo Chen, et al
Discusses dynamic multi-pooling CNNs for event extraction
**"Leveraging Event Semantics for Commonsense Knowledge Extraction"** by Nasrin Mostafazadeh, et al
Explores the use of event semantics for extracting commonsense knowledge
**"Event Detection with Neural Networks: A Rigorous Empirical Evaluation"** by Yubo Chen, et al
Provides an empirical evaluation of neural network approaches to event detection
**"Event Extraction as Machine Reading Comprehension"** by Yaojie Lu, et al
Proposes framing event extraction as a reading comprehension task
**"A Survey on Event Prediction"** by Yaojie Lu, et al
Surveys various methods and challenges in event prediction
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Taylor Berg-Kirkpatrick, et al
Discusses methods for event detection with minimal supervision
This list includes a mix of foundational works, surveys, and recent advancements in the field. Be sure to check the latest research for more recent developments beyond 2021
